Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Kwakhona yeha, inene kungekudala baza kwazi
ASiwenzanga	umhlaba	waba	ngumphangalalo owandlalekileyo na
Sakha phezu kwenu amazulu asixhenxe omeleleyo
Inene iMini yohlenga-hlengiso yinto esele imiselwe kakade
Mini leyo, iXilongo liya kuvuthelwa nize nibuyiswe niziindimbane
Baya kuhlala apho kuso iminyaka ngeminyaka
Akukho nto ipholileyo baya kukuyingcamla apho, kungekho nasiselo na kakade
Kuba abazanga boyike kufakwa ngxoxweni (ngezenzo zabo)
(Kuya kuthiwa kubo): “Ngcamlani ke iziqhamo (zezenzo zenu) kuba akukho songezelelo eSiya kuninika sona ngaphandle kwesohlwayo!”
Akukho mampunge baya kuwava apho nabuxoki
Umvuzo ophuma eNkosini yakho. Isipho esaneleyo
INkosi yamazulu nomhlaba, nako konke okuphakathi kuwo, uSolubabalo; Akukho namnye oya kuba nagunya lakuthetha naYe
IMini apho uMoya (oyiNgcwele) neengelosi ziya kuma ngemigca. Akukho namnye oya kuthetha ngaphandle kwalowo uya kuvunyelwa nguSozinceba, yaye uya kuthetha okulungileyo kuphela
Leyo	yiMini	yeNyaniso!	Ngako	oko	lowo	ufunayo makathabathe ukhuseleko ngeNkosi yakhe
Inene Sinilumkisile ngesohlwayo esikufuphi. Mini leyo umntu aya kuzibona izenzo zezandla zakhe, aze athi umchasi- kholo: “Yeha kum! Akwaba bendiluthuli
Zide zicwangcise (imiyalelo yeNkosi yazo) (xa kukhala iXilongo)
Kulandele intshukumo emva kwentshukumo (xa kukhala elesibini)
Iintliziyo ziya kubetha kabuhlungu ngaloo Mini
Bathi: “Ingaba ngenene siza kubuyiselwa kwimo yethu yamandulo na
Bathi: “Okokuba kunjalo, kuya kuba kukubuya okunelahleko (oko).”
Ingaba sele lifikile na ibali likaMûsâ kuwe
Xa	iNkosi	yakhe Yaye Yambiza	kwintili	(engcwele) yaseTuwâ
Nokuba ndikukhokelele eNkosini yakho ukuze uYoyike?”
Kodwa uFir’awn akawamkela umqondiso, akasithobela nesikhokelo
Kodwa uAllâh Wamhlasela, Wenza umzekelo ngaye kobu bomi nakuBomi oBuzayo
Inene kule mbali kukho isifundo sakhe nabani na omoyikayo uAllâh
Kunzima na ukudala nina kunezulu eliphezulu Alakhileyo
Uluphakamisile uphahla lwalo, Walicwangcisa, Walinika imfezeko
Ugqume ubusuku balo ngobumnyama Wavelisa imini yalo ngokukhanya
Waza apho kuwoWavelisa amanzi wawo nedlelo lawo
Ukanti iintaba zona Uzigxumeke zaqina nkqi
(Ukuze apho kuphume) isixhaso senu nemfuyo yenu
Mini leyo umntu aza kuyikhumbula into abe eyizabalazela
Ukanti uMlilo wesiHogo uya kubonakaliswa uthi thaa (kumntu wonke) obonayo
Owakhetha ubomi beli hlabathi (elandela iminqweno yakhe kunentando ka-Allâh)
Inene ikhaya lakhe liya kuba nguMlilo wesiHogo
Kodwa yena lowo waye waba noloyiko lokumiswa phambi kweNkosi yakhe (uAllâh), wazoyisa ekulandeleni iinkanuko zakhe ezikukungcola
Inene iPaladesi iya kuba likhaya lakhe
Wena (Muhammad) bakubuza ngeYure (bathi): liya kuba nini na ilixa (lokuzalisekiswa) kwayo
Mhla bayibona (iya kuba ngathi) baphile (kulo mhlaba) injikalanga yayo okanye intsasa yayo (kuphela)
Kodwa yintoni na enokukuchazela okokuba ngebhaqo nayo ibinokufumana ukuhlambuluka
okanye yamkele ululeko nenkumbuzo ukuze ibe luncedo kuyo
Kodwa yena lowo uze kuwe ebaleka
Nakanye! Kuba ngenene lo nguMyalezo oyinkumbuzo
Uqalekisiwe umtu ongakholwayo! (Kungani na ukuba angabi nambulelo kuAllâh)
(Umdale)	ngeqabaza	lembewu	yomntu!	Wamdala wazaWamlinganisela ngokwemfanelo
Waphinda Wamenzela lula indlela yakhe (yokuba azalwe)
Waphinda kwakhona Wamenza ukuba afe, angcwatywe
Kwakhona ngokwentando yaKhe, Uya kumbuyisela ebomini
Inene umntu akakwenzanga oko Amyalele kona
Ngoko ke umntu makakhe aqwalasele ukutya kwakhe
Kodwa yakufika ingxolo (ukukhala kweXilongo okwesibini ngeMini yoVuko)
Ngaloo Mini umntu uya kubaleka ashiye umntakwabo
Ngaloo Mini umntu ngamnye uya kuxakeka zezakhe, angazihoyi ezabanye
Ngaloo Mini ubuso babanye buya kukhazimla (bube buhle)
Ubuso babanye ngaloo Mini buya kuzala luthuli bumbatshe
Naxa iilwandle zinga zidwanguza amadangatya omlilo ziphuphuma
Naxa	amaphepha	(abhaliweyo)	[ezenzo	ezilungileyo (nezingcolileyo) zomntu ngamnye] etyhilwa elubala
Naxa isibhakabhaka sihlutyulwa sisuswa endaweni yaso
(Ngoko) umntu ngamnye uya kuyazi into ayivelisileyo (elungileyo nengalunganga)
Inene eli liLizwi (i’Kur’ân eliziswe) sisiThunywa esihloniphekileyo (uJibrîl, evela kuAllâh, esiza kuMprofeti uMuhammad)
Esinamandla, (nobungangamsha), siphuma (kuAllâh), iNkosi yeTrone (engenakushukunyiswa yinto ngaphandle kwentando yaKhe)
Hini na bantu! Ugxa wenu (uMuhammad) akaphambenanga
Ngokwenene yena wambona uJibrîl elundini olucacileyo

Kuye nabani na kuni ofuna ukuhamba ngokuthe tye
Yaye aninako ukuzithandela (ukuhamba ngokuthe tye) ngaphandle kokuba kuthande uAllâh, iNkosi yamaphakade
Umphefumlo	(ngamnye)	uya	kuyazi	into	oze	nayo ngaphambili noyishiye ngemva
Hini na wena mntu! Yintoni na ekwenze akwaYihoya iNkosi yakho, uSobubele
Nayiphi na imo Ethanda ukuba ube yiyo wena; Ikudibanisa ube njalo
Inene	phezu	kwenu	kukho	(iingelosi	ezinyulelwe) ukunilondoza
zilunge kakhulu, zihloniphekile, zibhala phantsi (konke) enikwenzayo
Inene abangcolileyo baya kuba seMlilweni wesiHogo
Baya kungena kuso apho ngoMhla wemivuzo
Yintoni na enokukucacisela ukuba uMhla wemivuzo (lo) uyintoni na
Kwakhona	yintoni	na	enokukucacisela	ukuba	uMhla wemivuzo (lo) uyintoni na
Iya kuba yiMini apho kungekho mphefumlo uya kuba namandla akwenzela nto omnye. Yaye ulawulo ngaloo Mini luya kuba loluka-Allâh (lonke)
Abo bathi xa kufuneka befumene into kwabanye abantu, bafune umlinganiselo ozeleyo
Kodwa xa kufuneka ibe ngabo amabanike abanye abantu umlinganiselo onguwo, suke bona babanike omncinane kunofanelekileyo
Abacingi na ukuba baza kuphinda bavuswe (baxoxiswe)
UMhla abaya kuthi bonke abantu bame phambi kweNkosi yamazwe
Yeha inene, imibhalo yezenzo zabangcolileyo igcinwe kwi- Sijjîn
Yintoni na enokukucacisela okokuba iyintoni na iSijjiîn
Lowo uthi xa efundelwa iziTyhilelo zeThu athi: “Ziintsomi zamandulo”
Nakanye! (Banongcoliseko) lomhlwa ezintliziyweni zabo ngenxa yezenzo zabo
Inene baya kusithwa bangayiboni iNkosi yabo ngaloo Mini
Kwakhona, inene baya kuphoswa eMlilweni wesiHogo
Inene iiNcwadi zezenzo zamalungisa zigcinwe kwi- ‘Iliyyûn
Yintoni na enokukucacisela okokuba iyintoni na i-’Iliyyûn
Ehleli ezihlalweni eziphakamileyo, emana ukujonga-jonga, (ebukela ubuhle bezinto eziseMyezweni)
Uya kubona inkazimlo yochulumanco ebusweni bawo
Unxano	lwawo	luya	kuqatyulwa	ngewayini	enyulu, etywiniweyo
Etywina	layo	liziziqholo	zeMisk1:	Nantsi	ke	into abanomnqweno abanokukhuphisana ngayo
Ixutywe namanzi omthombo weTasnîm. okwabo iya kuba ngumvuzo ongasokuze ube nasiphelo
Umthombo ekusela kuwo abo bakufuphi no Allâh
Inene, aboni babedla ngokubahleka abo bakholwayo
Ngalo lonke ixesha begqitha ecaleni kwabo (bakholwayo), baqobelane amehlo (begculela)
Baze bathi lonke ixesha xa bebabona bathi: “Yabonani! Aba bantu balahlekile ngenene!”
Ukanti babengathunywanga ukuba babe ngabalondolozi babo
Ngale	Mini	ngabakholwayo	abaya	kuba	behleka abangakholwayayo
Abamelanga	kubuyekezwa	na	abangakholwayo	ngoko bakwenzayo
Siphulaphule, sithobele iNkosi yaso yaye kunyanzelekile senze njalo
Sele utyekezele ngaphandle konke oko bekungaphakathi kuwo
Uphulaphula, uthobela iNkosi yawo yaye unyanzelekile wenze njalo
Hini na wena mntu! Inene, wena Uya kubuyela eNkosini yakho nezenzo zakho (oko) kukubuyela okungathandabuzekiyo
Lowo uya kunikwa iNcwadi yakhe (yezenzo) ngesandla sakhe sokunene
Inene lowo kungekudala ityala lakhe liya kuxoxwa ngokulula
Ke lowo uya kunikwa iNcwadi yakhe ngemva
Yaye uya kungena eMlilweni odwanguzayo, aviswe ukutshisa kwawo
Eneneni yena wayecinga ukuba asokuze abuyele (kuThi)
Ngoko ke Ndifunga ngokukhazimla kokutshona kwelanga
Nangobusuku nako konke obukuqokelela ngobumnyama babo
Niya kuhamba amanqanaba ngamanqanaba (kobu bomi nakuBomi oBuzayo)
Kanti yintoni na ngabo ukuba bangakholwa
Ukanti naxa i’Kurân icengcelezwa kubo abawi baqubude
Kanti	Yena	uAllâh	Ukwazi	kakuhle	abakuqokelelayo (okuzizenzo ezilungileyo nezingcolileyo)
Vakalisa ke ngoko isohlwayo esibuhlungu kubo
Ngaphandle kwabo bakholwayo benze izenzo zobulungisa
Behleli ecaleni kwawo (bebukele abo babetshiswa kuwo)
Yaye baye baba ngamangqina oko babekwenza ngokuchasene nabakholwayo
Akukho tyala limbi ababelenzile (abakholwayo) ngaphandle kokukholwa kuAllâh, uSomandla, Ofanelwe ziindumiso zonke
Yena nguMnini bukumkani bamazulu nomhlaba! Yaye uAllâh UliNgqina ngaphezulu kwazo zonke izinto
(Inene abo batshutshisa amakholwa namakholwakazi ngokuwangcungcuthekisa) baze bangaguquki, baza kufumana isohlwayo sesiHogo, yaye baza kufumana isohlwayo soMlilo otshisayo
Inene abo bakholwayo baze benze izenzo zobulungisa, okwabo iya kuba yiMiyezo ekumpompoza amanzi ngaphantsi kwayo. Leyo iya kuba yimpumelelo enkulu

Ke kaloku umntu, Ithi iNkosi yakhe Isakumvavanya ngokumnika intlonipheko nendyebo, asuke athi: (ngokuzigwagwisa): “INkosi yam Indinike intlonipheko.”
Kodwa Ithi Yakumvavanya ngokuthi Imnciphisele isixhaso sakhe, (aqale) athi: “INkosi yam Indincitshile.”
Yaye nidla amafa abo onke ngokunyoluka

NesiHogo siya kuziswa kufutshane ngaloo Mini. Ngaloo Mini umntu uya kukhumbula, kodwa loo nkumbulo iya kumnceda ntoni
Uya kuthi: “Kwowu! Akwaba ndandizenzele imisebenzi elungileyo kwangaphambili (ukusindisa) ubomi bam
Ke kaloku ngaloo Mini akukho mntu uya kohlwaya ngohlobo Aya kohlwaya ngalo Yena (uAllâh)
Akukho mntu uya kuqamangela abenzi (bobubi ngohlobo) Aya kuqamangela ngalo Yena
(Kuya kuthiwa kumntu okholiweyo): “Wena ke mphefumlo osekuphumleni nasekwanelisekeni okupheleleyo
Ucinga ukuba akakho onamandla ngaphezu kwakhe
Yintoni na enokukucacisela okokuba liyintoni na iqhina
Aze abe ngomnye wabo bakholwayo (kwi-Islam) abathi bakhuthazane ukunyamezela nomonde. Bakhuthazane kananjalo ngokuba nyulu nangokuba nemfesane
Ke bona abo bangakholwayo kwiiVesi zeThu, (ze`Kur’ân) bona ngabo bangasekhohlo (abahlali basesiHogweni)
Waza kananjalo Wawubonisa okungawulungelanga noko kuwulungeleyo
Xa oyena mntu wayengcole kakhulu phakathi kwabo waphuma (waya kubulala imazi yenkamela)
Kodwa uMthunywa ka-Allâh (uSâlih) wathi kubo: “Ze nilumke! (Noyike isihelegu esiya kunihlela), yimazi yenkamela ka-Allâh le, ningayibulali okanye niyithintele ekuseleni amanzi wayo
Bamphikisa ke bayibulala. Ngoko ke iNkosi yabo Yabatshabalalisa ngenxa yesono sabo, Yabenza batshabalala ngokulinganayo (abazizityebi nabangamahlwempu phakathi kwabo abangakholwayo)
Kwaye uAllâh Azanga Abe naloyiko lweziphumo zako oko

Akukho mntu uza kungena kuwo ngaphandle kosisingcoli (owala ukukholwa kwi-Islam)
Ke bona abamoyikayo uAllâh, baya kususwa babe kude kuwo (uMlilo)

Abo bangakholwayo phakathi kwaBantu beNcwadi nabanquli-zithixo babengekhe bayeke (ukuba ngabahedeni) de kwafika ubungqina obucacileyo kubo
UMthunywa ovela kuAllâh ecengceleza iziBhalo eziNgcwele
Apho kuzo kukho iiNcwadi ezilungileyo nezithe Tye
Kananjalo aBantu beNcwadi babengezontlaba zahlukane de kwafika ubungqina obucacileyo
Ukanti babengayalelwanga nto yimbi ngaphandle kokukuba, banqule uAllâh, banyaniseke enkolweni yaKhe, banquleYena Yedwa, benze iSalâh (umthandazo), banikele ngeZakâh, oko ke yayiyeyona Nkolo ithe Tye
Inene abo bangakholwayo phakathi kwaBantu beNcwadi nabanquli-zithixo baya kuba seMlilweni wesiHogo, ngonaphakade, bazezona zidalwa zibi
Inene, ke bona abo bakholwayo, benza imisebenzi yobulungisa, bazezona zidalwa zilungileyo

Umvuzo wabo oseNkosini yabo yiEdeni (uMyezo iPaladesi), ekumpompoza amanzi phantsi kwayo. Baya kuhlala apho kuyo ngonaphakade, uAllâh Uya kukholiseka ngabo nabo bakholiseke nguYe. Oko kokwabo bayoyikayo iNkosi yabo

Kanti nam andiyi kukunqula oko nina nikunqulayo
Ukanti nani aniyi kukunqula oko mna ndikunqulayo
Nina ninenkolo yenu nam ndinenkolo yam
Uze ubone abantu bengena enkolweni ka-Allâh (i-Islam) beziindimbane
Zukisa iNkosi yakho ke ngoko ngendumiso, ucele itarhu (kuYo). Inene Yona nguMxoleli Ohlala Esamkela inguquko
Mazitshabalale zombini izandla zika-Abû Lahab, (naye) atshabalale
Ubutyebi bakhe nabantwana bakhe bungamncedi nganto
Entanyeni yakhe uya kuqanyangelwa ngentambo yomthi wesundu
Nasekungcoleni kwalowo wenza umona njengoko esenza umona
Ekungcoleni	komsebezi	wokungcola	orhoxayo	(emva kokusebeza) kwakhe
